```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
ces |> 
  filter(year == 2020) |>
  select(approval, education, faminc, ideology) |>
  drop_na() |>
  slice_sample(n = 2000)
```

```{r}
x |>
  ggplot(aes(x = ideology, fill = approval)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs()
```
